title: RAM - The main cause of system slowdowns.
Keeping Your Computer Cool in the Heat.
excerpt: Keeping your computer cool on a particularly warm day is important if you are going to be using it a lot.  It is important to keep the computer cool for many reasons. The main one being that if your computer gets too hot it will simply turn itself off to protect itself and you will lose any unsaved data.
